org.apache.flink.runtime.state.filesystem

类 AbstractFsStateSnapshot<K,N,SV,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.AbstractCloseableHandle
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.filesystem.AbstractFileStateHandle
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.filesystem.AbstractFsStateSnapshot<K,N,SV,S,SD>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key in the snapshot state.
    N - The type of the namespace in the snapshot state.
    SV - The type of the state value.
    所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, Serializable, AutoCloseable, KvStateSnapshot<K,N,S,SD,FsStateBackend>, StateObject
    直接已知子类:
    FsFoldingState.Snapshot, FsListState.Snapshot, FsReducingState.Snapshot, FsValueState.Snapshot

    public abstract class AbstractFsStateSnapshot<K,N,SV,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>>
extends AbstractFileStateHandle
implements KvStateSnapshot<K,N,S,SD,FsStateBackend>
    A snapshot of a heap key/value state stored in a file.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractFsStateSnapshot

        public AbstractFsStateSnapshot(org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                               org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer,
                               org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<SV> stateSerializer,
                               SD stateDesc,
                               org.apache.flink.core.fs.Path filePath)
        Creates a new state snapshot with data in the file system.
        参数:
        keySerializer - The serializer for the keys.
        namespaceSerializer - The serializer for the namespace.
        stateSerializer - The serializer for the elements in the state HashMap
        stateDesc - The state identifier
        filePath - The path where the snapshot data is stored.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createFsState

        public abstract KvState<K,N,S,SD,FsStateBackend> createFsState(FsStateBackend backend,
                                                               HashMap<N,Map<K,SV>> stateMap)

      • restoreState

        public KvState<K,N,S,SD,FsStateBackend> restoreState(FsStateBackend stateBackend,
                                                     org.apache.flink.api.common.typeutils.TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                                                     ClassLoader classLoader)
                                              throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: KvStateSnapshot
        Loads the key/value state back from this snapshot.
        指定者:
        restoreState 在接口中 KvStateSnapshot<K,N,S extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State,SD extends org.apache.flink.api.common.state.StateDescriptor<S,?>,FsStateBackend>
        参数:
        stateBackend - The state backend that created this snapshot and can restore the key/value state from this snapshot.
        keySerializer - The serializer for the keys.
        classLoader - The class loader for user-defined types.
        返回:
        An instance of the key/value state loaded from this snapshot.
        抛出:
        Exception - Exceptions can occur during the state loading and are forwarded.

      • getStateSize

        public long getStateSize()
                  throws IOException
        Returns the file size in bytes.
        指定者:
        getStateSize 在接口中 StateObject
        返回:
        The file size in bytes.
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown if the file system cannot be accessed.
